Forhyre| PHP Developer | PHP, AngularJS, JS | India| Part time | Remote|

We at forhyre.com a freelancing kind of startup developing a great tool which automates the freelancing projects.

We are seed-funded 4-member startup based in Australia but doing most of the operations in India. We are also looking to raise $2M in coming 6 months.

Searching for early employees. Interested candidates: mail me at- harsha.nitj14@gmail.com
